trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_SEQ_00<tab>Despite the butterflies in his stomach, Chai-Nuzz is prepared to address the masses.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Chadden.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Kai-Shirr.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_000<tab>Sorry I wasn't much help. Still, seeing Master Chai go after those Talos was something, eh? Inspiring stuff.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>I daresay the future of Eulmore has never looked brighter.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_DULIACHAI_000_010<tab>Thank you again for finding my husband. I confess, I was not expecting your return to be quite so grand!
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_DULIACHAI_000_011<tab>That dear, sweet man. He is going to make the most wonderful mayor. I just know it!
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_WRENDEN_000_015<tab>There is no time to lose. We must begin making preparations for the inaugural address. Once Master Chai has caught his breath, of course.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_030<tab>No need to fret, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have never felt better. <cough>
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_031<tab>And not at all overawed by the prospect of addressing the assembled masses of Eulmore...
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_032<tab>As for where to do it... If we're to accommodate everyone who might feasibly wish to attend, I suppose the only place large enough would be the Emergent.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_WRENDEN_000_033<tab>Then I will go and spread the word among the citizens─both free and bonded─that they are to assemble there to meet their new mayor.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_WRENDEN_000_034<tab>You there, uh...Kai-Shirr, was it? Would you go and inform the residents of Gatetown and the Derelicts?
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_100_034<tab>'Course I will!
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_035<tab>Good lad. I will let the guards know not to bar the way to Vauthry's chambers.

TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_036<tab>...It goes without saying that I expect the Warrior of Darkness to attend─assuming <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s available? Might as well see it through to the bitter end, eh? The doorman at the Crown Lift will show you up.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_050<tab>Don't worry, I'll make sure everyone's there for Master Chai's big speech. So get yourself down to the Emergent! Go on!
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHADDEN_000_070<tab>Ah, yes. Master Chai told us to expect you. The Emergent is already filling up with people of all persuasions─free and bonded, citizens and non-citizens.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHADDEN_000_071<tab>But for you, our guest of honor, we have reserved a place at the front. Right this way, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_090<tab>Seeing everyone come together like that... <sniff> It was beautiful, that was.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_WRENDEN_000_095<tab>Now our work can begin in earnest. I very much look forward to seeing this Eulmore for the people.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_DULIACHAI_000_100<tab>Wasn't he simply wonderful? Seeing him take charge of the room as he did! Oh, it reminds me why I fell for him in the first place...
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_105<tab>The city of final pleasures, they used to call this place, back when the world was ending. But now...now I hope it will become the city of new endeavors.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>That was a fine speech, Master Chai. I believe your words stirred every soul in attendance.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_121<tab>Stirred them to action, I hope. If I have learned anything from all of this, it is that change begins with the individual.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_122<tab>'Tis but a matter of finding the strength to take the first step.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_WRENDEN_000_123<tab>Assuming my fellow Eulmorans can, it shall be my honor and privilege to help them walk this road we have chosen.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_124<tab>But we must not forget the individuals who made all of these changes possible.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_100_124<tab>Were it within my power, I would carve a tribute to your heroism into the very stone upon which this city stands.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_DULIACHAI_000_127<tab>I hate to change the subject, darling...but now that you have officially taken office, have you given any thought to your mayoral seat...?

TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_128<tab>We will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be moving into the Emergent, dearest. It's too big, for one thing, and too far from the people for another. We will retain our current residence, and I will govern here in the Parlor.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_DULIACHAI_000_130<tab>Oh, I was hoping you'd say that! I much prefer the view from the Parlor.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_HATHENBET_000_131<tab>(-???-)Beggin' your pardon, Master Chai... But have you got time for a word?
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_132<tab>Ah, y-yes. Yes of course, er...Hathen...bet?

TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_HATHENBET_000_133<tab>Aye, that's me. I liked your speech. But there's folk outside these walls as don't even have enough food to last till tomorrow, and more who're countin' their crumbs. If ye've a plan to change that, I want to help set things in motion.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_134<tab>Then we've much to discuss.

TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_CHAINUZZ_000_135<tab>No sooner do I take office than my work begins in earnest. Well, I suppose I brought it upon myself. Thank you again for your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope to see you again before long.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_137<tab>What a day... I dunno what it means exactly, but I do know I've got plenty to think about.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_138<tab>I sense we all have a great deal to consider.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_139<tab>I had resolved to remain here until such time as Eulmore's future was secured, but it is clear to me now that the city is in capable hands.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_140<tab>I have every confidence they will find their way, and I believe it is time we went on ours.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_160<tab>With Master Chai at the helm, if only for the interim, I feel I can bid farewell to Eulmore, and return to the Source with no regrets.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_180<tab>So Alphinaud's leaving too, is he? Seems like everyone's moving on. Everything's changing...

TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_181<tab>I've been thinking about what <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> should do in all this. Like I told you, I spent most of my life dreaming about living here with my friends. In paradise.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_182<tab>That paradise is gone, but something better's taken its place. And I reckon I want to be a part of it.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_100_182<tab>This “Eulmore for the people” Master Chai's been going on about ain't gonna build itself, after all. Not that I'm much of a builder.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_183<tab>Me and my friends'll find a way to make a difference, though─help keep things changing for the better.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_ALPHINAUD_000_185<tab>A far nobler dream than the one to which you clung before─and one I am happy to say we share. Whatever path you choose, I will pray for your success.
TEXT_LUCKMG109_03681_KAISHIRR_000_186<tab>Well, when you put it like that, there's no going back now, is there? We've got a few ideas on how we can do our bit. Just a matter of taking the first step!
